about_the_game:
“The evil undead Dark Lord has been resurrected and is trying to destroy the world.

Please help us, warrior.”

This game is a combination of roguelike and strategic defense in a fantasy world featuring guns, and the ultimate goal is to strengthen the cave with the goods obtained through daytime search and nighttime defense and defeat enemy bosses and dark lords.

During the search, battles and events appear randomly, and the battle at this time is an auto battle. Through preliminary scouting and reconnaissance activities, you can check the size and combination of the opponent and prevent accidents. With the goods obtained through this, you have to prepare inevitable battle during the evening. In a defensive battle, you will directly control your soldiers.

Economy:

The economy is somewhat challenging. Two main resources, Gold and Magic Stones, are used to recruit soldiers, cover building maintenance, and fund upgrades. Passive investments that don't prepare for battles increase the risk of failed scouting or defense, while overly aggressive investments could lead to the collapse of your entire dungeon.
The economy is closely tied to combat power, and soldiers may desert if their wages are not adequately paid. It’s up to you to decide whether to use your resources in the morning or afternoon, as timing is also critical.

Combat:

During scouting missions, automated combat relies on algorithms tailored to each class. Tank lines block the enemy, while support and healing units retreat when threatened. Over time, even the same battlefield will evolve in appearance and danger levels. New attack routes and enemies with unique traits will emerge, keeping you on your toes.
Some enemies heal quickly, possess thick armor, have high evasion rates, or use status-inflicting attacks. If reconnaissance and scouting fail to reveal the enemy’s types and numbers, choosing alternative morning strategies—such as exploiting refugees, collecting taxes, or charging sacred flames—might be a better choice.
At night, strong walls and towers reduce the burden of battle. However, you must now control your units using the W, A, S, D keys for movement and Q, E, 1, 2, 3, 4 keys for abilities. Mouse controls are unavailable, emphasizing strategic thinking over raw mechanical skill.
When facing waves of enemies, carefully form a defensive line and stay clustered. However, against foes with area attacks or bosses with unique patterns, you’ll need to scatter swiftly or sacrifice units as needed.

Key Design Focus:

We prioritized delivering a tactile experience with satisfying hit feedback through physics and sound effects. The gameplay emphasizes decision-making skills.
While luck plays a significant role in outcomes, the game design ensures that well-prepared or experienced players have at least one way to turn disasters into opportunities. By honing your ability to assess your situation and utilize available information, you can reduce risks and find enjoyment in continually making optimal choices.

Boss fights are an important game element.

Powerful bosses various patterns are very annoying.

Be creative to overcome them!

**Currently, the game is in the early access stage. (1man dev)

Tier 3 and awakening skill branches are under development

short_description: Undead army fills the world, and we are trapped in the cave of an ancient god. Roguelike strategic defense! Use your resources wisely, lead your soldiers, and unite the survivors. Ultimately, turn your cave into a fortress capable of defeating the undead king. The fate of the world is in your hands.
